p: We used a two-step procedure to estimate the monthly R 0 for each of the 254 Texas counties (hereafter county-month R 0): (1) estimate a priori county-month R 0 distributions using published ecological models of ZIKV transmission [ 4, 6], and (2) using these as Bayesian priors, generate posterior R 0 distributions based on reported importations and subsequent local transmission.
